name: Train of Thought (Blaer, Skylar, studio colle)
name_original: Train of Thought (Blaer, Skylar, studio colle)
description:
On the way to work, you take off your headphone -
Suddenly everyone's inner voice merges into a piece of music.

A Game By
JD Calvelli
Skylar Ai
Blaer Zhang

Assets
1 minute of Brown Noise
Elevator Music
Low poly headphones sprite
Low Poly Animated People
Free Low-Poly Bike Models
FREE Skybox Extended Shader
